name: Format\DataTable
description: The component for adding a JSON data table.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Provides data for the table. Also provides information about the data, such as data types and header labels, in the form of the data descriptor.

properties.name: dataOrientation
properties.description: Determines the table orientation. Valid values:

properties.name: role
properties.description: This component always has a role of datatable.

properties.name: showDescriptorLabels
properties.description: Determines whether the headers are shown. If true, the headers will be visible, with the labels defined in the RecordStore. If false, the headers will not be visible.

properties.name: sortBy
properties.description: An array that determines how table data is sorted. Rules are applied in the order in which they are provided in the array.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Either an inline ComponentStyle object that defines the appearance of this component or a string reference to a component style that is defined at the top level of the document.
